feed.title: Combined summary - [c-lightning] Welcoming a New C-lightning Core Team Member!

entry.title: Combined summary - [c-lightning] Welcoming a New C-lightning Core Team Member!
entry.summary: A member of the Lightning-dev mailing list, ZmnSCPxj, has asked if it's necessary for him to set up a GPG (GNU Privacy Guard) key. The context of this request is unknown, but it appears that he is having some difficulty setting up GPG satisfactorily. He suggests that his commit access could be revoked instead. It is unclear what prompted this inquiry.
